sen.j: 森重流砲術（もりしげりゅうほうじゅつ）は砲術の流派のひとつ。
sen.e: Morishige-ryu hojutsu was a school of gunnery.
Morishige-ryu hojutsu was a school of gunnery.
Morishige-ryu hojutsu was a school of gunnery.

sen.j: 流祖は森重都由（もりしげ すべよし）、周防国末武（現、山口県下松市）の出身。
sen.e: The founder of this school was Subeyoshi MORISHIGE, who came from Suetake, Suo Province (present-day Kudamatsu City, Yamaguchi Prefecture).
The founder of this school was Subeyoshi MORISHIGE, who came from Suetake, Suo Province (present-day Kudamatsu City, Yamaguchi Prefecture).
The founder of this school was Subeyoshi MORISHIGE, who came from Suetake, Suo Province (present-day Kudamatsu City, Yamaguchi Prefecture).

sen.j: 三島流舟戦法を学び、18歳のとき故郷を出て諸国を回り安盛流、中島流、遠国流、禁伝流等の砲術を学び、橋爪廻新斎流合武伝法、甲州、越後の兵学を得た。
sen.e: After learning the naval battle tactics of Santo school, he left his hometown at the age of eighteen and traveled around the country to learn the art of gunnery of various schools such as the Asaka, Nakajima, Ongoku, and Kinden; he mastered Hashizume kaishinsai-ryu Gobudenpo 橋爪廻新斎流合武伝法, and military science in Koshu and Echigo.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処 「橋爪廻新斎流合武伝法」の意味と読み方がわかりませんでした
sen.e: After learning the naval battle tactics of Santo school, he left his hometown at the age of 18 and traveled around the country to learn the art of gunnery of various schools such as the Asaka, Nakajima, Ongoku, and Kinden; he mastered Hashizume Kaishinsai school Gobu-denpo (橋爪廻新斎流合武伝法), and military science in Koshu and Echigo.
sen.cmt: 数字に訂正しました。-ryuをschoolに訂正しました。橋爪廻新斎流合武伝法→読み方不明。括弧で原文補足しました。ハイフン補足しました。
sen.e: After learning the naval battle tactics of Santo school, he left his hometown at the age of 18 and traveled around the country to learn the art of gunnery of various schools such as the Asaka, Nakajima, Ongoku, and Kinden; he mastered Hashizume Kaishinsai school Gobu-denpo (橋爪廻新斎流合武伝法), and military science in Koshu and Echigo.

sen.j: 船戦要法28巻を著し、合武三島流軍船学（ごうぶさんとうりゅう）を興した、後にその砲術部門を森重流と呼ばれるようになった。
sen.e: He wrote "the 28 volumes of Funaikusa yoho" (the method of a naval battle) and established naval science of Gobu-Santo school; its section of gunnery was later to be called Morishige school.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He wrote "the 28 volumes of Funaikusa yoho" (the method of a naval battle) and established naval science of Gobu-Santo school; its section of gunnery was later to be called Morishige school.
He wrote "the 28 volumes of Funaikusa yoho" (the method of a naval battle) and established naval science of Gobu-Santo school; its section of gunnery was later to be called Morishige school.

sen.j: 現在神奈川県立伊勢原射撃場で活動中。
sen.e: The Kanagawa Prefectural Isehara Shooting Range is currently a stage of its activities.
The Kanagawa Prefectural Isehara Shooting Range is currently a stage of its activities.
The Kanagawa Prefectural Isehara Shooting Range is currently a stage of its activities.

sen.j: （2006年現在同射撃場は工事閉鎖中のため、千葉市の千葉県総合スポーツセンター射撃場を稽古場としている。）
sen.e: (As of 2006, that shooting range is provisionally closed because of construction, so the shooting range in the Chiba Prefecture General Sports Center is temporarily used as its training ground.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: (As of 2006, that shooting range is provisionally closed because of construction, so the shooting range in the Chiba Prefecture General Sports Center is temporarily used as its training ground.)
(As of 2006, that shooting range is provisionally closed because of construction, so the shooting range in the Chiba Prefecture General Sports Center is temporarily used as its training ground.)

sen.j: 会員は日本前装銃射撃連盟の会員でもあるので、火縄銃の実弾射撃にも長けて、マズルローダー世界選手権のメダリストも居る。
sen.e: Since the members of this school belong to the Muzzle Loaders' Shooting Association of Japan, they excel in firing matchlock guns with live shots; this school produced the medalist of the International Muzzle Loader Contest.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Since the members of this school belong to the Muzzle Loaders' Shooting Association of Japan, they excel in firing matchlock guns with live shots; this school produced the medalist of the International Muzzle Loader Contest.

Since the members of this school belong to the Muzzle Loaders' Shooting Association of Japan, they excel in firing matchlock guns with live shots; this school produced the medalist of the International Muzzle Loader Contest.

sen.j: 毎年、愛知県新城市の「長篠合戦のぼりまつり」において、米沢藩古式砲術保存会・長篠設楽原鉄砲隊と競演で演武を行う。
sen.e: Every year in the Nagashino Banner Festival held in Shinshiro City, Aichi Prefecture, they conduct a demonstration of gunfire together with the Preservation Society of Traditional Gunnery of Yonezawa Domain and the Nagashino Shitaragahara Musket Corps.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処 「米沢藩古式砲術保存会」「長篠設楽原鉄砲隊」の英訳名がわかりませんでした
sen.e: Every year in the 'Nagashino Banner Festival' held in Shinshiro City, Aichi Prefecture, they conduct a demonstration of gunfire together with the Preservation Society of Traditional Gunnery of Yonezawa Domain and the Nagashino Shitaragahara Musket Corps.
sen.cmt: 原文に合せて' 'を補足しました。
sen.e: Every year in the 'Nagashino Banner Festival' held in Shinshiro City, Aichi Prefecture, they conduct a demonstration of gunfire together with the Preservation Society of Traditional Gunnery of Yonezawa Domain and the Nagashino Shitaragahara Musket Corps.

sen.j: また、（財）日本武道館・日本古武道協会主催の「日本古武道演武大会」でも公開している（2004年は日本武道館、2005年は兵庫県立武道館で演武、2007年熊本市総合体育館・青年会館）。
sen.e: They also have demonstrations in "Nihon Kobudo Enbu Taikai" (an annual event) sponsored by the Japanese Classical Martial Arts Association of the Nippon Budokan (Nippon Budokan in 2004, Hyogo Prefecture Budokan in 2005, Kumamoto City General Gymnasium and Youth Center in 2007).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: They also have demonstrations in 'Nihon Kobudo Enbu Taikai' (an annual event) sponsored by the Japanese Classical Martial Arts Association of the Nippon Budokan (Nippon Budokan in 2004, Hyogo Prefecture Budokan in 2005, Kumamoto City General Gymnasium and Youth Center in 2007).
sen.cmt: 原文の「」に合せて"を'に訂正しました。
sen.e: They also have demonstrations in 'Nihon Kobudo Enbu Taikai' (an annual event) sponsored by the Japanese Classical Martial Arts Association of the Nippon Budokan (Nippon Budokan in 2004, Hyogo Prefecture Budokan in 2005, Kumamoto City General Gymnasium and Youth Center in 2007).
